column2: Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetSheHeCap] single handedly brought victory in several Black Crusades, and there are numerous legends spun in [This.Founder.GetHerHis] honor.
Relentless Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetSheHeCap] is known for personally leading the charge of many battles in the Black Crusades, and it is said none could ever bring [This.GetHerHim] down.
Chaos Lord Blood of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
[This.GetSheHeCap] was given rule of [This.PrimaryTitle.GetBaseName] after a Black Crusade.
Join Black Crusade
A Black Crusade is ongoing, we could early glory by participating.
Declare Black Crusade
If you are strong enough you may force the hordes of Chaos to a target of your choosing, you must declare the Black Crusade within 3 years.
Become the Everchosen
If you are strong enough you may claim the mantle of the Everchosen.
Join defence against Black Crusade
A Black Crusade is ongoing, we could early glory by helping.

§RWarhammer:§! Black Crusades
Only Prestigious Chaos Undivided Rulers and the Everchosen can call Black Crusades, chaos followers can join as allies when the war starts. Only one Black Crusade can be active at a time.
